mapper.select: select u.*, e.name as enterprise_name, e.address as enterprise_address, crc.role as role from t_user u left join t_enterprise e on u.enterprise_id = e.id left join t_fabric_check_role_config crc on crc.user_id = u.id and crc.is_delete = '0' where u.phone = #{phone} and u.password = #{password}
select u.*, e.name as enterprise_name, e.address as enterprise_address from t_user u left join t_enterprise e on u.enterprise_id = e.id where u.id = #{userId}

select u.id, u.name, u.avatar, d.name as departmentName, e.name as enterpriseName from t_user u left join t_department d on d.id = u.department_id and d.delete_status = '0' left join t_enterprise e on e.id = u.enterprise_id and e.delete_status = '0' where u.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId}
